original_title: ‘Daraz 11.11 kicks off with unbeatable discounts, exclusive offers’
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s leading e-commerce platform, Daraz, has officially launched its annual 11.11 shopping festival, known as the “Biggest Sale of the Year.” The event will run until November 17. This year’s 11.11 sale features exceptional discounts and exclusive promotions, offering Sri Lankans the lowest prices of the year on a wide variety of products. Additionally, there are vouchers worth over LKR 150 million available, making this sale a must for anyone looking to save big.

This year, Daraz is offering discounts of up to 90% on millions of products across popular categories such as Electronics, Fashion, Health & Beauty, and FMCG. Well-known brands including Fonterra, Mead Johnson Nutrition, Unilever, Diamond Best Foods, Cetaphil, Marvel, Baseus, DIMO Retail, Mobil, Celcius, GSK, Janet, Promate, Reckitt, and more will be featured in the festival, ensuring there is something for every shopper’s wish list. From everyday essentials to high-end electronics, customers can look forward to discovering incredible value across all categories.

Enhancing the shopping experience even further, Daraz has introduced special offerings such as Free Delivery across the entire platform and additional up to 20% discounts in partnership with over 15 payment partners, including Commercial Bank, DFCC Bank, HSBC, Union Bank, People’s Bank, Nations Trust American Express, Frimi, Genie,Union Bank, HNB, BOC, LOLC Finance, PABC Bank and NDB Bank. These partnerships offer extra discounts and easy payment options for pre-paid orders, making it easier than ever for shoppers to buy what they need without breaking the bank. Furthermore, Daraz also offers buy-now-pay-later to make payment options more flexible.

Shoppers can dive into Daraz’s interactive features, designed to bring both excitement and savings to their experience. The voucher collection center offers exclusive vouchers, like Voucher Max, enabling customers to unlock and accumulate savings throughout the event. Additionally, Flash Sales provide limited-time, deep discounts of up to 90% off on popular items, giving shoppers more opportunities to snap up fantastic deals before they are gone. The New Arrivals section will showcase exclusive launches and a fresh assortment for discovery, while options like Any 3, Hot Deals, and Buy More, Save More allow customers to maximize savings through bundled purchases. Shoppers can also earn Daraz Coins by engaging in fun activities like frequent check-ins, which can be redeemed for additional discounts, adding even more value to their shopping journey.
